title: Introduction to Trading
description: Learn the basics of stock market trading
content: Trading involves buying and selling financial instruments in various markets. The goal is to generate profits by capitalizing on price movements. Understanding market basics, order types, and risk management are fundamental skills every trader should master.

title: Risk Management
description: How to manage risk in trading
content: Risk management is crucial for long-term success in trading. Key concepts include position sizing, stop losses, and portfolio diversification. Never risk more than 1-2% of your capital on a single trade.

title: Technical Analysis Basics
content: Technical analysis involves studying price charts and patterns to predict future price movements. Common tools include moving averages, RSI, MACD, and support/resistance levels.

title: Candlestick Patterns
content: Candlestick patterns provide visual insights into market sentiment. Common patterns include doji, hammer, engulfing, and morning/evening stars. These patterns help identify potential reversals or continuations.
